      • MemStat

        public MemStat(java.lang.Long aMemTotal,
       java.lang.Long aMemFree,
       java.lang.Long aMemCached,
       java.lang.Long aSwapTotal,
       java.lang.Long aSwapFree,
       java.lang.Long aSwapCached)
        Create a new DiskStat instance
        Parameters:
        aMemTotal - Total amount of memory in bytes
        aMemFree - Free amount of memory in bytes
        aMemCached - The amount of cached memory in bytes
        aSwapTotal - Total amount of swap space in bytes
        aSwapFree - Free amount of swap space in bytes
        aSwapCached - The amount of cached swap space in bytes

        Total amount of memory in bytes, including SWAP space

        Returns:
        Free amount of memory in bytes, including SWAP space and cached memory

        Returns:
        Amount of cached memory including SWAP space

      • usage

        public java.lang.Long usage()
        Returns:
        Amount of used memory including SWAP (Cached memory not included)

        Returns:
